subject: Re: [junit] Re: One test for all implementors of an interface
msgSnippet: ... I m really surprised it took so long for someone to refer to Abstract Test Cases or Contract Tests. After all this time, has no-one else written about
messageBody:
On 2008-12-14, at 14:54 , Ilja Preu√ü wrote:
> http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?AbstractTest
>
I'm really surprised it took so long for someone to refer to Abstract
Test Cases or Contract Tests. After all this time, has no-one else
written about this? I've proven myself far too lazy to bother, but
perhaps I need to find the time.
----
